data.title: MKD Funeral Homes
data.meta_description: Obituary, tributes, photos, and flower ordering for Brian VandenBerg
data.meta_site_name: MKD Funeral Homes | Grand Rapids, MI
data.text: Brian Thomas VandenBerg, age 33, of Hudsonville, passed away on September 8, 2018 from injuries sustained in a car accident. The family finds comfort in the joys he is now experiencing with his Savior in Heaven. He will be lovingly remembered by his parents, Tom and Deb VandenBerg; brothers, Mike VandenBerg, Eric and Jess VandenBerg; sister, Kelly and Dan Arendsen; his nieces he loved so dearly, Rylee, Alexa, and Emma VandenBerg, Breckyn and Hayden VandenBerg, Quinn Arendsen; grandparents, Tom and Joyce VandenBerg, Bob and Faith Niewenhuis. Brian proudly served our country in the United States Marine Corps for 8 years, reaching the rank of Captain. Funeral services will be held on Friday, September 14, 2018 at 11:00 a.m. at Zutphen Christian Reformed Church, 3223 40th Ave., Hudsonville, with Pastor Josh VanDrunen officiating. Interment will be held at Star Cemetery in Jamestown, MI. Relatives and friends may meet the family on Thursday from 5-8 p.m. at Matthysse Kuiper DeGraaf Funeral Home (Grandville) 4145 Chicago Dr. SW and on Friday from 10-10:45 a.m. at the church prior to the service. Those who wish may make memorial contributions to Team Rubicon, a group that unites the skills and experiences of military veterans with first responders to rapidly deploy emergency response teams.
